verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* wealthy \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: ye great \w men|strong="H3478"\w*, heads \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* state \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* ye \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* Chalane, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thence \w into|strong="H3381"\w* Emath \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*: \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* Geth \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w larger|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* separated unto \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* throne \w of|strong="H3117"\w* iniquity;

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5695"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w beds|strong="H4296"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* wanton \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w couches|strong="H4296"\w*: \w that|strong="H5695"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* herd;

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* sing \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sound|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* psaltery: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w music|strong="H7892"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*;

\w That|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* best ointments: \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3130"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w concerned|strong="H2470"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

Wherefore \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w go|strong="H1540"\w* \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w at|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w them|strong="H1540"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w go|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* faction \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* luxurious ones \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w be|strong="H6258"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w detest|strong="H8130"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* inhabitants thereof.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w also|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* manâ€™s kinsman \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* burn \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inner|strong="H1004"\w* \w rooms|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w Is|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0657"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* answer: \w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* end. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H5221"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*: \w Hold|strong="H1004"\w* thy peace, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* mention \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* behold \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord hath commanded, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6666"\w* strike \w the|strong="H3588"\w* greater house \w with|strong="H4941"\w* breaches, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lesser house \w with|strong="H4941"\w* clefts.

\w Can|strong="H3947"\w* horses run upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* rocks, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3947"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* plough \w with|strong="H1697"\w* buffles? \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* turned \w judgment|strong="H1697"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* bitterness, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H1697"\w* justice \w into|strong="H3947"\w* wormwood.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* nought: \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Have|strong="H1471"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w taken|strong="H6965"\w* unto \w us|strong="H5921"\w* horns \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* own strength?
But behold, I will raise up a nation against you, O house of Israel, saith the Lord the God of hosts; and they shall destroy you from the entrance of Emath, even to the torrent of the desert.
